inclusion.criterion: complain of localized provoked vulvar pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: meet the criteria for the diagnosis of localized provoked vulvodynia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: have failed or have been unable to tolerate previous attempts at systematic therapy or surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The presence of a dermatologic or neurologic condition which is determined by the investigator to be the primary cause of the patient's pain.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to any of the medications or the base itself.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent use of the following medications.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of severe 'exploding' headache due to AVM, but is improving with pain medication.
